verses.name: 2 Corinthians 6:6
verses.text: By pureness, by knowledge, by longsuffering, by kindness, by the Holy Ghost, by love unfeigned,

verses.name: 2 Corinthians 6:7
verses.text: By the word of truth, by the power of God, by the armour of righteousness on the right hand and on the left,

verses.name: 2 Corinthians 6:8
verses.text: By honour and dishonour, by evil report and good report: as deceivers, and yet true;

verses.name: 2 Corinthians 6:9
verses.text: As unknown, and yet well known; as dying, and, behold, we live; as chastened, and not killed;

verses.name: 2 Corinthians 6:10
verses.text: As sorrowful, yet alway rejoicing; as poor, yet making many rich; as having nothing, and yet possessing all things.
